00004 #include <TriggerConfiguration.hh>

00006 namespace CALICE {
00018   class SimpleTriggerConfiguration : protected TriggerConfiguration
00019   {
00020   public:
00021     SimpleTriggerConfiguration() {};
00022     //  ~SimpleTriggerConfiguration() {}
00023 
00024     void init(const std::string &configuration_col_name, 
00025               const std::string &assignment_col_name,
00026               const std::string &beam_trigger_bit_name,
00027               const std::string &cosmics_trigger_bit_name,
00028               const std::string &pedestal_trigger_bit_name) {
00029     
00030       TriggerConfiguration::init(configuration_col_name,assignment_col_name);
00031 
00032       _beamTriggerID     = getTriggerTypeID(beam_trigger_bit_name);
00033       _cosmicsTriggerID  = getTriggerTypeID(cosmics_trigger_bit_name);
00034       _pedestalTriggerID = getTriggerTypeID(pedestal_trigger_bit_name);
00035 
00036       TriggerMask::init();
00037     };
00038 
00039     bool isBeamTrigger() const {
00040       return triggerConfMatches( _beamTriggerMask, _beamTriggerValue);
00041     };
00042 
00043     bool isCosmicsTrigger() const {
00044       return triggerConfMatches( _cosmicsTriggerMask, _cosmicsTriggerValue );
00045     };
00046 
00047     bool isPedestalTrigger() const {
00048       return triggerConfMatches( _pedestalTriggerMask, _pedestalTriggerValue );
00049     };
00050 
00051   
00052   protected:
00053     void configurationChanged() {
00054 
00055       // print(std::cout);
00056 
00057       _beamTriggerMask     = getMask( _beamTriggerID );
00058       _cosmicsTriggerMask  = getMask( _cosmicsTriggerID );
00059       _pedestalTriggerMask = getMask( _pedestalTriggerID );
00060       _beamTriggerValue     = getValue( _beamTriggerID );
00061       _cosmicsTriggerValue  = getValue( _cosmicsTriggerID );
00062       _pedestalTriggerValue = getValue( _pedestalTriggerID );
00063 
00064     };
00065 
00066   private:
00067     UInt_t _beamTriggerMask;
00068     UInt_t _cosmicsTriggerMask;
00069     UInt_t _pedestalTriggerMask;
00070 
00071     UInt_t _beamTriggerValue;
00072     UInt_t _cosmicsTriggerValue;
00073     UInt_t _pedestalTriggerValue;
00074   
00075     UInt_t _beamTriggerID;
00076     UInt_t _cosmicsTriggerID;
00077     UInt_t _pedestalTriggerID;
00078   };
00079 }
